title: Mahlon Blaine's SINDBAD
description: Much more than a coloring book,with full page Mahlon Blaine illustrations that first appeared in The Adventures of Sindbad the Sailor in 1936. All thirty-three drawings are included here.The original  tales from 1907 were Laurence Housman adaptations of the Sindbad voyages in Stories from the Arabian Nights, originally published in London. Now, enjoy all-new SINDBADverses created by Roland Trenary and based upon vintage versions. Like a tuneful soundtrack, these read-aloud lyrics are companions to the drawings and enhance  the original tales.
author: Roland Trenary
